entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then snow beginning before morning. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
